overall_perception_summary.headline: Clinically Validated Glass Skin
overall_perception_summary.description: Medicube bridges the gap between viral K-Beauty trends and rigorous dermatological science, creating a 'Pink Lab' territory. By anchoring the playful 'jelly' texture in hard data (percentages, clinical trials), it transforms the ethereal promise of 'glass skin' into a calculated, achievable scientific outcome. It is a viral aesthetic validated by a white coat.

foundation.title: The Validated Empowerer
foundation.description: The brand acts as The Empowerer, using clinical authority not just to heal, but to elevate skin to a 'glass' standard. It operates with Radical Transparency, sacrificing mystique for hard numbers ('1.29% increase') and full ingredient disclosure. Positioned as The Clean Essentialist, it balances a polished, aesthetic allure with a trustworthy, data-driven foundation.

identity.title: The Pink Expert
identity.description: The Personality is The Reliable Expert—distant, competent, and focused on 'real results'—dressed in the visual codes of Gen-Z Pop (pink, jelly). The Magician archetype drives the narrative of instant transformation ('visible results after one use'), while the Visual Identity uses a 'Pharma-Code' layout softened by warm pastel tones to signal safe efficacy.

communication.title: Data-Driven Alchemy
communication.description: The Messaging is pure Chemist, hooking the user with ingredient names ('Collagen') and persuading with raw data rather than poetry. The USP is The Tech Engineer, claiming ownership of the 'Jelly' format as a delivery system for absorption. The Focus is Science Education, prioritizing diagrams, stats, and 'how-it-works' content over lifestyle fluff.

benefits.title: Intelligent Correction
benefits.description: Functionally, it delivers Correction, aiming for a visual overhaul (elasticity, glow) rather than just maintenance. The Emotional Benefit is Intelligence—the user feels savvy for choosing a 'clinically tested' viral hit. Socially, it is The Safe Choice, leveraging its '#1 Global Best Seller' status to prove that millions of others have already vetted the results.

marker_1.slider_a_label: [SLIDER] ORIGIN OF AUTHORITY (The Source of Power)
marker_1.reasoning: The authority is strictly clinical ('Global Institute of Dermatological Sciences', 'Clinical Trial Tested'), placing the origin in the lab (Origin: 2/5). However, the mission is not merely fixing pathology; it is creating a hyper-idealized aesthetic ('Glass Glow', 'Jelly', 'Plump'). This combination of medical backing for an aesthetic upgrade defines The Empowerer.
marker_1.evidence: Clinical Trial Tested by the 'Global Institute of Dermatological Sciences'... Boosts hydration and inner glow... Leaves skin looking plump and dewy... 1.29% increase in skin elasticity

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Clinical) + Slider B (4/5 Enhancement) creates a 'Medical Beauty' profile which maps to The Empowerer (using science to elevate/empower appearance).

marker_2.reasoning: The mission is personal optimization—'real results' for skin texture and glow (Scope: 2/5). The access barrier is non-existent; claims like '#1 Global Best Seller' and '2.5M+ Sold' signal massive availability and democratic reach (Access: 5/5). They are democratizing clinical-grade K-Beauty results.
marker_2.evidence: #1 Global Best Seller... 2.5M+ Sold Globally... That's More Than 1 Every Minute... Dedicated to real results

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Optimization) + Slider B (5/5 Democratic) matches typical pattern for Territory 1 - The Democratizers.

marker_3.slider_b_position_name: ▼ The Spec Sheet (Exact percentages, pH, sourcing)
marker_3.reasoning: This brand does not ask you to trust a vibe; it asks you to trust the numbers. '1.29% increase', '2.4% firmer', '100% reported'. Performance is the priority (4/5), and they prove it with high-density data and full ingredient lists shown as feature graphics (Transparency: 1/5 The Spec Sheet).
marker_3.evidence: 1.29% increase in skin elasticity... 2.4% firmer-looking skin... Ingredients: Hydrolyzed Collagen, Salmon Egg Extract, Niacinamide... Clinical Trial Tested

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (4/5 Potency) + Slider B (1/5 Data) matches typical pattern for Territory 2 - Radical Transparency. The reliance on specific percentage improvements is the key signal.

marker_4.reasoning: Visually, the product is highly polished—translucent pink jelly, stylized swirls, and glowing models (Aesthetic: 4/5). It occupies a 'Masstige' slot where clinical validation ('Global Best Seller') meets an elevated, trend-driven aesthetic (Value: 3/5). While the clinical data suggests 'Scientific Miracle', the accessible 'Best Seller' volume pulls it toward a polished essential. The 'Pink Jelly' visual anchor creates a Clean Essentialist vibe with a heavy dose of science.
marker_4.evidence: Pink translucent jar... glossy vibrant pink jelly cream... #1 Global Best Seller... 2.5M+ sold globally

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Holistic reading suggests 'Scientific Miracle' (due to clinical claims), but Grid logic for High Aesthetic (4) + Mid Value (3) routes to 'The Clean Essentialist'. The brand sits on the razor's edge of 'Clinical Prestige' and 'Viral Pop'.

marker_5.reasoning: Despite the pink visuals, the brand *voice* is strictly professional. It speaks in statistics, clinical results, and institute names ('Global Institute of Dermatological Sciences'). It does not use slang or try to be your BFF; it stands above you as the expert with the data (Authority: 5/5). The warmth comes from the color, not the personality (Warmth: 2/5).
marker_5.evidence: Clinical Trial Tested... 1.29% increase... 2.4% firmer... Dedicated to real results... Our mission is to deliver true skin science

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Distant) + Slider B (5/5 Deity) matches typical pattern for Territory 3 - The Reliable Expert. The heavy reliance on 'Institute' and 'Clinical' drives the authority score.

marker_6.reasoning: The core promise is transformation: 'Visible Results After One Use', 'Glass Glow', 'Rejuvenates'. This is The Magician (60%). The methodology is The Sage (25%)—using 'Freeze Dried Hydrolyzed Collagen' and clinical trials to explain the magic. The Jester (15%) appears in the 'Jelly' texture and pink color, making the science fun.
marker_6.evidence: Visible Results After One Use... 1.29% increase in skin elasticity... 100% reported enhanced glow... Jelly texture... #1 Global Best Seller

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Territory derived from dominant Archetype group (Mastery/Change).

marker_7.reasoning: The voice is direct, factual, and energetic about results. It avoids jokes (Humor: 1/5) and maintains a professional stance (Formality: 2/5), but gets excited about the data: '#1 Global Best Seller', 'Visible Results!' (Enthusiasm: 4/5). This combination of data-focus and high energy defines a Modern Minimalist tone that uses facts as its primary form of excitement.
marker_7.evidence: #1 Global Best Seller... 2.5M+ Sold Globally... Visible Results After One Use... Clinical Trial Tested

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Enthusiasm 4 prevents 'Clinical Authority' (needs Ent <= 2) and 'Gentle Guide' (needs lower enthusiasm/humor mix). Fits 'Modern Minimalist' default or 'Hype Beast' edge, but lack of slang keeps it Minimalist.

marker_8.reasoning: While the product itself is a vibrant pink, the surrounding visual architecture is clinical. White backgrounds, grid layouts for ingredients, split-screens for before/afters, and sans-serif typography create a structure of control (Entropy: 2/5). The temperature balances the warm product against the cool, sterile environment (Temp: 3/5), ultimately signaling a 'Pink Pharma' aesthetic.
marker_8.evidence: Split layout — left for ingredients, right for product... Plain background for readability... Centered composition... White text on soft pink
marker_8.look_and_feel: Clinical rigor meets aesthetic pleasure; a sterile lab environment showcasing a vibrant, sensory object.
marker_8.distinctive_asset_4: Upward arrow icons next to claims
marker_8.primary_palette: Clinical white and neutral beige backgrounds punctuated by vibrant, glossy pinks and bold black/white typography.

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (3/5 Neutral) + Slider B (2/5 Structured) matches typical pattern for Territory 1 - Pharma-Code. The structure dominates the color in determining territory.

marker_9.reasoning: The hook is the molecule: 'Collagen', 'Niacinamide', 'Squalane'. The product is named after the ingredient (Hook: 1/5). The persuasion is pure data: '1.29% increase', '2.4% firmer', 'Clinical Trial Tested' (Persuasion: 1/5). It argues via chemistry and math.
marker_9.evidence: Collagen + Soluble Collagen... Hydrolyzed Collagen... 1.29% increase... 2.4% firmer-looking skin... Clinical Trial Tested

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Molecule) + Slider B (1/5 Raw Data) matches typical pattern for Territory 1 - The Chemist.

marker_10.reasoning: The story is told by the 'Global Institute of Dermatological Sciences' and the brand 'Medicube'. There is no founder, no farm, no kitchen. The hero is the institution, and the setting is the clinical trial lab where the '1.29% increase' was measured.
marker_10.evidence: Clinical Trial Tested by the 'Global Institute of Dermatological Sciences'... Our mission is to deliver true skin science... Dedicated to real results

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Nobel) + Slider B (1/5 Lab) matches typical pattern for Territory 1 - The Lab Breakthrough.

marker_11.reasoning: While they mention '#1 Global Best Seller' (Crowd), the *primary* truth mechanism is the clinical study. The '1.29% increase' and 'Clinical Trial Tested' claims act as the ultimate veto. The Lab is the validator, and the Statistic is the proof.
marker_11.evidence: Clinical Trial Tested... 1.29% increase in skin elasticity... 2.4% firmer-looking skin... #1 Global Best Seller

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Lab) + Slider B (1/5 Graph) matches typical pattern for Territory 1 - Derm-Validation.

marker_12.slider_a_label: [SLIDER] THE OWNERSHIP CLAIM (What Makes You Unique)
marker_12.slider_a_position_name: ▼ The Delivery Innovation (How it works, not what's in it)
marker_12.slider_b_label: [SLIDER] THE TARGET SCOPE (How Wide Is The Net?)
marker_12.reasoning: The uniqueness isn't just Collagen (commodity), but the 'Jelly' format and 'Freeze Dried Hydrolyzed' processing. They frame the jelly texture as a functional delivery system for 'Next-Level Radiance' and absorption. The scope is broad (Global Best Seller), positioning it as a tech-engineered solution for the mass market.
marker_12.evidence: Collagen Jelly Cream... Freeze Dried Hydrolyzed Collagen... Enhance absorption... 2.5M+ Sold Globally

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (4/5 Delivery) + Slider B (3/5 Category) matches typical pattern for Territory 2 - The Tech Engineer.

marker_13.reasoning: The content mix is heavy on explanation: ingredient lists, device pairing instructions, and detailed before/after breakdowns with arrows and stats. It isn't just pitching; it's teaching the user how the 'skin science' works (Depth: 2/5). The intent is to prove efficacy through evidence (Intent: 2/5).
marker_13.evidence: Split layout — left for ingredients... Before and after facial skin photos... 1.29% increase... Pair it / Mix it instructions

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Explainer) + Slider B (2/5 Evidence) matches typical pattern for Territory 1 - Science Education.

marker_14.reasoning: This is aggressive correction. It claims to 'Rejuvenate', 'Firm', and Increase Elasticity. It is reversing aging signs (Action: 5/5). The goal is a highly visual, aesthetic outcome: 'Glass Glow', 'Dewy', 'Plump'. It targets the look of the skin, not just its health (Outcome: 4/5).
marker_14.evidence: Rejuvenates skin... 1.29% increase in skin elasticity... 2.4% firmer-looking skin... Leaves skin looking plump and dewy... Glass glow

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (5/5 Fixer) + Slider B (4/5 Aesthetic) matches typical pattern for Territory 4 - Correction.

marker_15.slider_b_position_name: ▼ Savvy (I feel smart/validated for choosing this)
marker_15.reasoning: The emotional hook is competence. By buying the product with 'Clinical Trial' proof and '1.29% increase' stats, the user feels Savvy (4/5). They aren't just hoping it works; they have the data to prove they made a smart choice. The Reassurance (2/5) comes from the scientific backing, not just a 'safe' feeling.
marker_15.evidence: Clinical Trial Tested... 2.5M+ Sold Globally... Real Results... True skin science

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Reassurance) + Slider B (4/5 Savvy) routes to Territory 4 - Intelligence (Competence) per the logic table (Mid/Low Anxiety + High External).

marker_16.slider_a_position_name: ▼ The Smart Choice (because it makes sense)
marker_16.reasoning: Buying Medicube signals that you are plugged into the 'Trending' K-Beauty conversation ('#1 Global Best Seller', 'Viral'). However, the heavy data focus makes it also a 'Smart Choice'. The dominance of the 'Global Best Seller' badge pushes it into The Trend-Setter territory—you are buying it because it is the 'It' product, validated by science.
marker_16.evidence: #1 Global Best Seller... 2.5M+ Sold Globally... That's More Than 1 Every Minute... Visible Results After One Use

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Smart Choice) + Slider B (2/5 Trending) sits between Pragmatist and Trend-Setter. Given the 'Glass Skin' aesthetic and volume claims, Trend-Setter (Relevance) is the stronger fit.

marker_17.slider_a_position_name: ▼ Normalization (I want to look like everyone else)
marker_17.reasoning: The headline claim '#1 Global Best Seller' and '2.5M+ Sold' is a pure safety signal. It invites the user to join The Majority. There is no risk in buying what 'more than 1 person every minute' buys. It validates the purchase through sheer volume of consensus.
marker_17.evidence: #1 Global Best Seller... 2.5M+ Sold Globally... That's More Than 1 Every Minute

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Normalization) + Slider B (1/5 Majority) matches typical pattern for Territory 1 - The Safe Choice.
